item.title: Scraping the LV Municipal Court database
item.description: Case information from the Las Vegas Municipal Court can be accessed through an ASP.NET Web Form. We’ll be doing a bit of scraping. Case lookup. Case lookup is available here. That page contains a frame with a single form element. That form takes a single argument, 16 digits or less in length. I was going to tackle this with the mechanize library. First run based on the scraperwiki mechanize cheat sheet:
